tasks.title: Add Liability Cap Clause
tasks.instruction: Add a limitation of liability clause to Section 8 or create a new section if it doesn't exist. The liability cap should limit damages to the total fees paid in the 12 months preceding the claim. Exclude from the cap: (a) indemnification obligations, (b) breaches of confidentiality, and (c) willful misconduct.
